title: Self-Tandem Catalysis of Fast Mg2+ Desolvation and Sulfur Conversions for Ultrahigh-Performance Mg-S Battery via Serially-Assembled Atomic Reactors
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04028C, Paper
Qinghua Guan, Jian Wang, Quan Zhuang, Jing Zhang, Linge Li, Lujie Jia, yongzheng zhang, Hongfei Hu, Huimin Hu, Shuang Cheng, Huang Zhang, Huihua Li, Meinan Liu, Shuangyin Wang, Hongzhen Lin
Rechargeable magnesium-sulfur (Mg-S) batteries are famous for their high volumetric energy density and much improved safety without possible dendrite formation. However, the performances of Mg-S batteries are severely hindered by...
